0.1.name: wordpress/xp-uploader
0.1.description:
This Wordpress plugin allows images to be uploaded to a photo-blog using the Windows XP Publish to Web Wizard. The current implementation requires the excellent Yet Another Photo Blog' plugin from J.P.Jarolim to be installed and active.

When this plugin is activated, an additional Options page is added titled XP-Upload. This page contains a link that will lead to the download of a xppubwiz.reg file, containing the necessary windows registry settings to enable the upload functionality. Register the entries in this file by double-clicking the file. When done so, select some images in explorer, and in the left pane select the "publish to web" option. There you will find your blog.
